title: LAUGFS supermarkets offer free essentials for everyone this Avurudu season
body_lines: LAUGFS Supermarkets are rewarding their customers with exciting offers this Avurudu season. Everyone who meets the promotion’s requirements will receive a complimentary essential item. The offer extends the rewards to all customers without limiting the number of customers through a raffle draw promotion.

Grab your free essentials with LAUGFS, when shop between Rs.1500/- – Rs.2999/- with 3 nominated brands, get your 1KG Free White Rice instantly. Shop between Rs.3000/- – Rs.4999/- with 4 nominated brands and get your 1KG of White Sugar and White raw rice 1KG. Shop over Rs.5000/- with 5 nominated brands & get instantly LAUGFS Super own label noodles 400g and MACKEREL 425g Free. Aside from the free essentials, all eligible customers will receive a free discount voucher worth Rs. 250/- to be redeemable between May 2nd and May 15th, 2022. Count yourself in, for these benefits are only valid from March 18th to April 30th, 2022.
